column17:
Swiss Army Mountain Water Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2925

The Alps are a symbol of pure and untainted beauty; a jewel in the crown of mother nature. A luxurious fur of snow white that flaunts a regal air standing tall in cold beauty. Swiss Army Mountain Water brings you the essence of the lush springs that stream through this flawless mountain range. It washes over her like the tranquil showers caress the green grass on its path.

A cool whiff of this fragrance is enough to keep your spirits high for the whole day. Like the stream paves its path on the beautiful slope this perfume flows through your senses. The enchanting woman can wear this at any time of the day. A drop of this scintillating Eau De Toilette and you can frolic on the mountainside like Heidi. Floating within a cylindrical vial that is placed in a metallic base this perfume exudes a nonpareil charm. The azure-hued perfume is topped with a metallic cap. A spritz of this Swiss mountain water and glide amidst meadows of edelweiss.
